rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with a foyer.
Spacious living area following Vastu's main direction alignment for positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed according to local norms with ample space.
Fully equipped kitchen area meeting Indian building standards.
Primary bedroom with a spacious balcony, aligned to the northeast for auspiciousness.
Secondary bedroom with a balcony designed following Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom with a private balcony.
Fourth bedroom equipped with a balcony and designed to ensure privacy.
Fifth bedroom featuring a balcony in accordance with Vastu for positive energy.
Enhanced master bedroom with extended balcony space and improved view.
Dedicated servant's quarters designed to ensure comfort while accommodating joint family needs.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented as per Vastu guidelines.
Additional exit/entry door aligned with local building norms.
Balcony windows ensuring proper ventilation and natural light.

vastu_compliance.notes: Design incorporates Vastu principles such as positioning of rooms to harness positive energy and proper alignment with cardinal directions.

building_norms.local_regulations: All structural dimensions are compliant with Indian residential building norms, including safety margins and setback requirements for an 80x100 feet plot.
